__e: Well, Sir John is gone. God be with him.
But you need me, Sir John, isn't that right?
She doesn't see it, Sir John.
He say their father, Sir William Johnson, understand there is time make war and time not make war.
Not quite, Sir William, if you have time.
Please, Sir William, speak with me alone.
Nothing, Sir Thomas, it was out of place.
We better check our position with the photographs, Sir Thomas.
Now, that's a word I don't like, Sir Thomas!
Sir Richard is appointed Attorney General for Wales.
My dear woman, Sir Richard and Lady Morris, arriving this evening. For two nights. You see, they saw our advertisement in Country Life.
You shall see her at once, and before Sir Richard bursts with passion.
Well may I ask if he is going to honor us with a visit himself?
Thank you, that is unnecessary. Would you like to have this fur-coat?
I cannot think where she might be and there were only 2 places laid for dinner.
Then Sir Charles was not the only one who was present at each party.
I certainly wrote to him once or twice to acknowledge his delicacy and his generosity.
